about_the_game: Wrangel Island is a survival game set in the Ice Age where players can choose to play as the various factions in the game. They can play as the herbivores which work together to survive and defend themselves from the various predators on the island. Then there are the carnivores who relentlessly hunt down the inhabitants of the island for food and may work in packs to fight even the largest of threats. Finally the players can choose to play as the humans on the island, every skill available to get the upper hand on the animals that they hunt, or hunt them.
detailed_description: Wrangel Island is a survival game set in the Ice Age where players can choose to play as the various factions in the game. They can play as the herbivores which work together to survive and defend themselves from the various predators on the island. Then there are the carnivores who relentlessly hunt down the inhabitants of the island for food and may work in packs to fight even the largest of threats. Finally the players can choose to play as the humans on the island, every skill available to get the upper hand on the animals that they hunt, or hunt them.
name: Wrangel Island

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4330 3.00 GHz or AMD FX-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R7 260x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3770 3.4GHz or AMD or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280X or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

short_description: A survival game set in the Ice Age where man and animal collide, work together with others or attempt to survive alone in these frozen lands.
